sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至三亞經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: The following items are examples of the benefits operators have achieved by using the component removal reduction (CRR) process.
sentences.chinese: 以下內容是使用CRR程序後受益航空公司的實例。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的支持讓航空公司拓展到貨物和旅客的服務。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Bohol via Manila on PR.
sentences.chinese: 宿霧航空公司來回香港至保和經馬尼拉經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: Congress also is looking into the safety of regional airlines that fly the 30- to 90-seat planes.
sentences.chinese: 國會也正在調查區域性航空公司的安全問題。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Xiamen on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至廈門機票。

sentences.english: PMA spare parts in many western countries have been adopted by the airlines.
sentences.chinese: PMA的零配件已被很多歐美國家的航空公司所採用。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Kaohsiung on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至高雄機票。

sentences.english: Airline personnel collect the spare coins and paper currency from passengers.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司工作人員從乘客那裏收集這些硬幣和紙幣。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Sydney on QF.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲航空公司來回香港至悉尼機票。

sentences.english: Please reconfirm with the airplane company in 72 hours before the flight.
sentences.chinese: 在啓航前的七十二小時內跟航空公司再確認。

sentences.english: Which airline you choose traval to China?
sentences.chinese: 請問你會乘搭哪一間航空公司回中國？

sentences.english: The CAAC said it won't approve applications for new airlines.
sentences.chinese: 民航總局稱，將不再批准新設航空公司的申請。

sentences.english: Airlines and passengers benefitted from the increased safety and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司和乘客受惠於提高安全性和效率。

sentences.english: And 15 airlines will have special tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 並與15家航空公司定有特約運價。

sentences.english: The airline guaranteed that proper adoption procedures would be followed .
sentences.chinese: 航空公司保證按照正當的過繼程序辦事。

definition: airline (abbr. for 航空公司[hang2 kong1 gong1 si1])
Air China (abbr. for 中國國際航空公司|中国国际航空公司[Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1])

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
Delta Air Lines, Inc., airline headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia
China United Airlines, abbr. for 中國聯合航空|中国联合航空[Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 he2 Hang2 kong1]
Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
